name: Fixed Header Jumping Issue Divi Theme
author: WP-EXPERTS.IN Team

sections.description:
Fix jumping header divi plugin has provide a permanent solution for Divi theme jumping header issue. The jumping header in Divi is a well-known issue. If all site content flashes with unstyled content with Divi theme then install & activate this plugin and fix the content flashing issue.

How To Fix The Jumping Header In Divi ? Just install and enable this plugin and say good bye to Divi theme header jumping issue.

Please don’t forget to leave your valuable feedback and suggestions to make our plugin much better compared to other plugins.

 Do you have any suggestion? share it
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1.  Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2.  Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3.  The settings page will be available under appearance menu (Appearance >> Header Jump Issue)
sections.faq:
Is this resolve the header jumping issue for Divi theme?

 * Yes, this plugin will resolve the divi theme header jumping issues.
